p: Essential oil was obtained from the fresh leaves, by hydrodistillation in a Clevenger-type apparatus in triplicate until no more condensing oil could be seen (3 h) [ 7]. Samples were dried with anhydrous sodium sulfate and kept in amber vial at 4 Â°C until chromatographic analysis. Essential oil content (%) was calculated as the volume (mL) of essential oil per 100 g of fresh leave matter.
